verses.verse: כְּדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> When Ephraim רְתֵ֔ת <WH7578> trembling נָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> he exalted ה֖וּא <WH1931> himself בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> himself in Israel וַיֶּאְשַׁ֥ם <WH816> but when he offended בַּבַּ֖עַל <WH1168> in Baal וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> he died

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6258> and now יוֹסִ֣פוּ <WH3254> more and more לַחֲטֹ֗א <WH2398> And now they sin וַיַּעְשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> and have made לָהֶם֩ מַסֵּכָ֨ה <WH4541> them molten images מִכַּסְפָּ֤ם <WH3701> of their silver כִּתְבוּנָם֙ <WH8394> according to their own understanding עֲצַבִּ֔ים <WH6091> [and] idols מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> all of it the work חָרָשִׁ֖ים <WH2796> of the craftsmen כֻּלֹּ֑ה <WH3605> All לָהֶם֙ הֵ֣ם <WH1992> They אֹמְרִ֔ים <WH559> they say זֹבְחֵ֣י <WH2076> that sacrifice אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of them Let the men עֲגָלִ֖ים <WH5695> the calves יִשָּׁקֽוּן׃ <WH5401> kiss

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore יִֽהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> become כַּעֲנַן־ <WH6051> cloud בֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> Therefore they shall be as the morning וְכַטַּ֖ל <WH2919> dew מַשְׁכִּ֣ים <WH7925> and as the early הֹלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> that passeth away כְּמֹץ֙ <WH4671> as the chaff יְסֹעֵ֣ר <WH5590> [that] is driven with the whirlwind מִגֹּ֔רֶן <WH1637> out of the floor וּכְעָשָׁ֖ן <WH6227> and as the smoke מֵאֲרֻבָּֽה׃ <WH699> out of the chimney

וְאָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yet I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> from the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וֵאלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> no god זֽוּלָתִי֙ <WH2108> but me לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not תֵדָ֔ע <WH3045> and thou shalt know וּמוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> for [there is] no saviour אַ֖יִן <WH369> there בִּלְתִּֽי׃ <WH1115> beside me
אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְדַעְתִּ֖יךָ <WH3045> I did know בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> thee in the wilderness בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land תַּלְאֻבֽוֹת׃ <WH8514> of great drought

כְּמַרְעִיתָם֙ <WH4830> According to their pasture וַיִּשְׂבָּ֔עוּ <WH7646> so were they filled שָׂבְע֖וּ <WH7646> they were filled וַיָּ֣רָם <WH7311> was exalted לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> and their heart עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that שְׁכֵחֽוּנִי׃ <WH7911> therefore have they forgotten

וָאֱהִ֥י <WH1961> become לָהֶ֖ם כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> will be like שָׁ֑חַל <WH7826> Therefore I will be unto them as a lion כְּנָמֵ֖ר <WH5246> as a leopard עַל־ <WH5921> by דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way אָשֽׁוּר׃ <WH7789> will I observe

אֶפְגְּשֵׁם֙ <WH6298> I will meet כְּדֹ֣ב <WH1677> them as a bear שַׁכּ֔וּל <WH7909> [that is] bereaved וְאֶקְרַ֖ע <WH7167> [of her whelps] and will rend סְג֣וֹר <WH5458> the caul לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> of their heart וְאֹכְלֵ֥ם <WH398> and there will I devour שָׁם֙ <WH8033> There כְּלָבִ֔יא <WH3833> them like a lion חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> beast הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> the wild תְּבַקְּעֵֽם׃ <WH1234> shall tear
שִֽׁחֶתְךָ֥ <WH7843> thou hast destroyed יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> O Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בִ֥י בְעֶזְרֶֽךָ׃ <WH5828> thyself but in me [is] thine help

אֱהִ֤י <WH165> I will מַלְכְּךָ֙ <WH4428> be thy king אֵפ֔וֹא <WH645> where וְיוֹשִֽׁיעֲךָ֖ <WH3467> [is any other] that may save בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עָרֶ֑יךָ <WH5892> your cities וְשֹׁ֣פְטֶ֔יךָ <WH8199> and your judges אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of whom אָמַ֔רְתָּ <WH559> of whom thou saidst תְּנָה־ <WH5414> Give לִּ֖י מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> me a king וְשָׂרִֽים׃ <WH8269> captain
אֶֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> I gave לְךָ֥ מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> thee a king בְּאַפִּ֔י <WH639> in mine anger וְאֶקַּ֖ח <WH3947> and took בְּעֶבְרָתִֽי׃ <WH5678> [him] away in my wrath ס
צָרוּר֙ <WH6887> [is] bound up עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> The iniquity אֶפְרָ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim צְפוּנָ֖ה <WH6845> [is] hid חַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <WH2403> his sin

חֶבְלֵ֥י <WH2256> The sorrows יֽוֹלֵדָ֖ה <WH3205> of a travailing woman יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> shall come ל֑וֹ הוּא־ <WH1931> he בֵן֙ <WH1121> son לֹ֣א <WH3808> is not חָכָ֔ם <WH2450> upon him he [is] an unwise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> is not עֵ֥ת <WH6256> long לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> for he should not stay בְּמִשְׁבַּ֥ר <WH4866> in [the place of] the breaking forth בָּנִֽים׃ <WH1121> of children

מִיַּ֤ד <WH3027> them from the power שְׁאוֹל֙ <WH7585> of the grave אֶפְדֵּ֔ם <WH6299> I will ransom מִמָּ֖וֶת <WH4194> them from death אֶגְאָלֵ֑ם <WH1350> I will redeem אֱהִ֨י <WH165> I will דְבָרֶיךָ֜ <WH1698> be thy plagues מָ֗וֶת <WH4194> O death אֱהִ֤י <WH165> I will קָֽטָבְךָ֙ <WH6987> be thy destruction שְׁא֔וֹל <WH7585> O grave נֹ֖חַם <WH5164> repentance יִסָּתֵ֥ר <WH5641> shall be hid מֵעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> from mine eyes

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ה֔וּא <WH1931> he בֵּ֥ן <WH996> among אַחִ֖ים <WH251> among [his] brethren יַפְרִ֑יא <WH6500> Though he be fruitful יָב֣וֹא <WH935> shall come קָדִים֩ <WH6921> an east wind ר֨וּחַ <WH7307> the wind יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִמִּדְבָּ֣ר <WH4057> from the wilderness עֹלֶ֗ה <WH5927> shall come up וְיֵב֤וֹשׁ <WH954> shall become dry מְקוֹרוֹ֙ <WH4726> and his spring וְיֶחֱרַ֣ב <WH2717> shall be dried up מַעְיָנ֔וֹ <WH4599> and his fountain ה֣וּא <WH1931> It יִשְׁסֶ֔ה <WH8154> he shall spoil אוֹצַ֖ר <WH214> the treasure כָּל־ <WH3605> of every כְּלִ֥י <WH3627> vessels חֶמְדָּֽה׃ <WH2532> of all pleasant

תֶּאְשַׁם֙ <WH816> shall become desolate שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> Samaria כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מָרְתָ֖ה <WH4784> for she hath rebelled בֵּֽאלֹהֶ֑יהָ <WH430> against her God בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפֹּ֔לוּ <WH5307> they shall fall עֹלְלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5768> their infants יְרֻטָּ֔שׁוּ <WH7376> shall be dashed in pieces וְהָרִיּוֹתָ֖יו <WH2030> and their women with child יְבֻקָּֽעוּ׃ <WH1234> shall be ripped up פ
